actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.
Subcommittee on International Trade. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to suspend the duties on semiconductors and computers.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duties on semiconductors and computers. Declares such suspension to become effective by April 1, 1984, or within six months from the date of enactment of this Act, whichever is later, if the President has determined that such suspensions of duties are in the national economic interest.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the duties on semiconductors and computers.
